mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expulsions(playersName, teamsId, positionsId, reasonsId, createdAt) VALUES(#{playersName}, #{teamsId}, #{positionsId}, #{reasonsId}, NOW());
mapper.select: SELECT e.id, e.playersName, t.teamsName, po.positions, r.reasons, e.createdAt FROM expulsions e LEFT OUTER JOIN teams t ON t.id = e.teamsId LEFT OUTER JOIN positions po ON po.id = e.positionsId LEFT OUTER JOIN reasons r ON r.id = e.reasonsId ORDER BY t.createdAt DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE expulsions SET expulsions.reasonsId = #{reasonsId} WHERE expulsions.id = #{id}
